org.raistlic.common.config.io

Interface ConfigIO


  • public interface ConfigIO
    The core interface for configuration input and output.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readConfig(ConfigBuilder configBuilder, java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      The method loads the configuration information from the specified inputStream into the configBuilder.
      Config readConfig(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      The method loads the configuration information from the specified inputStream, as a Config instance.
      void writeConfig(ConfigSource config, java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      The method writes the specified config to the outputStream , the format of the persisted configuration information is implementation specific, but it should be a format that the same implementation would be able to read it back via the readConfig(ConfigBuilder, InputStream) method.

    • Method Detail

      • writeConfig

        void writeConfig(ConfigSource config,
                 java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
          throws InvalidParameterException,
                 ConfigIOException
        The method writes the specified config to the outputStream , the format of the persisted configuration information is implementation specific, but it should be a format that the same implementation would be able to read it back via the readConfig(ConfigBuilder, InputStream) method.
        Parameters:
        config - the config information to be persisted, cannot be null.
        outputStream - the output stream to write the config to, cannot be null and must be open for write.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when config or outputStream is null.
        ConfigIOException - when anything goes wrong during the process of writing the config.

      • readConfig

        Config readConfig(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
           throws ConfigIOException
        The method loads the configuration information from the specified inputStream, as a Config instance. The format of the configuration information must be supported by the ConfigIO implementation, in order to be loaded, see alse writeConfig(ConfigSource, OutputStream) .
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input stream to load config information from, cannot be null and must be open for read.
        Returns:
        the loaded configuration information.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when inputStream is null.
        ConfigIOException - when anything goes wrong during the process of loading the config.

      • readConfig

        void readConfig(ConfigBuilder configBuilder,
                java.io.InputStream inputStream)
         throws ConfigIOException
        The method loads the configuration information from the specified inputStream into the configBuilder. The format of the configuration information must be supported by the ConfigIO implementation, in order to be loaded, see alse writeConfig(ConfigSource, OutputStream) .
        Parameters:
        configBuilder - the config builder to load the configuration information into, cannot be null.
        inputStream - the input stream to load config information from, cannot be null and must be open for read.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when configBuilder or inputStream is null.
        ConfigIOException - when anything goes wrong during the process of loading the config.
